title: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: When retrieving datetime values from a table, the format of the values displayed in the dynamic text item differs from the format displayed in the data/text item.
EB: The datetime values retrieved from the table should be displayed in the same format in both the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Insert a text, data, and dynamic text item. 2. Save and preview the page. 3. Input new Date() as the content for all three items. 4. Verify that the datetime values displayed in the data/text item and the dynamic text item are the same.
